console.log("Deployed to:", lottery.address);
await lottery.deployed();
const lottery = await ConfidentialLotteryFHE.deploy();
const ConfidentialLotteryFHE = await ethers.getContractFactory("ConfidentialLotteryFHE");
const [deployer] = await ethers.getSigners();
const ConfidentialLottery = await ethers.getContractFactory("ConfidentialLottery");
console.log("Deployed to:", address);
const address = await lottery.getAddress();
await lottery.waitForDeployment();
const lottery = await ConfidentialLottery.deploy();
const ConfidentialLottery = await ethers.getContractFactory("ConfidentialLottery");
const ConfidentialLottery = await ethers.getContractFactory("ConfidentialLottery"); const lottery = await ConfidentialLottery.deploy(); await lottery.waitForDeployment(); const address = await lottery.getAddress(); console.log("Contract deployed to:", address);
echo 'Contract deployment için şu komutları Hardhat console\'da çalıştırın:'
